gen:link.msg:message: `ReasonsForExceedingMaximumAmountOfRemuneration` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration` is greater than 0. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU1_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU1_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReceivableUnduePaymentsExplanation` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `UnduePayments` is greater than 0. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU2_UnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtNumericGTConstantThnExistenceCovPU2_UnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RemunerationActivitiesSeniorOfficer` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU1_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU1_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RemunerationMaximumOrHigherIndividualRemunerationSeniorOfficer` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU4_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU4_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Remuneration` MUST be equal to + `SubtotalRemuneration` - `UnduePayments`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_Remuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_Remuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_SubtotalRemuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_SubtotalRemuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_UnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables2_UnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Remuneration` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU2_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU2_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`SubtotalRemuneration` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU3_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU3_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`WntInstitutionActivitiesSeniorOfficer` MUST be reported with `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis`, because `NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU5_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesRemunerationOfExecutiveSeniorOfficialsConsideredFourYearsSpecification_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovPU5_Set00NameOfSeniorOfficialConsideredFourYearsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
